title: Desert Essence 100% Pure Jojoba Oil 4 Oz
description: Gluten free. Vegan. Non GMO Project verified. nongmoproject.org. For hair, skin, and scalp. No Ordinary Oil: 100% Pure golden goodness - nothing added! Desert Essence 100% Pure Jojoba Oil is a natural plant extract that moisturizes without leaving an oily residue or clogging pores. Closest to skin's natural oils, it moisturizes where you need it most and less where you don't. Perfect for hair, skin and scalp. No chemical processing or additives. 24 hour moisture. Cold pressed. www.desertessence.com. Certified B Corporation. Cruelty free. Made in the U.S.A.
